Indication: treatment of patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS G12C mutation and disease progression, monotherapy context

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
PICOs.Comparator: Docetaxel (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours)
PICOs.Outcomes: overall survival, progression-free survival, symptomatology, health status

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
PICOs.Comparator: Pemetrexed (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours and except in cases predominantly squamous histology)
PICOs.Outcomes: overall survival, progression-free survival, symptomatology, health status

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
PICOs.Outcomes: overall survival, progression-free survival, symptomatology, health status

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
PICOs.Comparator: Pembrolizumab (only for patients with PD-L1 expressing tumours (PD-L1 expr â‰¥ 1% of tumour cells))
PICOs.Outcomes: overall survival, progression-free survival, symptomatology, health status

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
PICOs.Outcomes: overall survival, progression-free survival, symptomatology, health status

PICOs.Population: Adults with advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) with KRAS p.G12C mutation after first-line therapy with cytotoxic chemotherapy
PICOs.Comparator: Docetaxel in combination with nintedanib (only for patients with PD-L1 negative tumours and adenocarcinoma histology)
PICOs.Outcomes: overall survival, progression-free survival, symptomatology, health status

PICOs.Population: Adults for whom docetaxel is the appropriate patient-individual therapy
PICOs.Outcomes: overall survival, morbidity, health-related quality of life, side effects

PICOs.Population: Adults for whom a therapy other than docetaxel is the appropriate patient-individual therapy
PICOs.Outcomes: overall survival, morbidity, health-related quality of life, side effects
